nodes.name: Aetherwind
nodes.summary: The ultimate verticality mod! Aetherwind introduces several floating islands in many different regions. Suspended by the mysterious Aetherveil, a force of energy different factions wish to preserve or reshape for their own ambitions.

nodes.name: Shadow of Aetherius
nodes.summary: Meet an adventurer on a pilgrimage in the Fields of Kummu, and begin a quest that travels through Vvardenfell, Solstheim and Aetherius. End reward is a companion with the ability to travel between Nirn and Aetherius.

nodes.name: Dwemer Sky Fortress
nodes.summary: Towering over the Grazelands to the south, Arkngchend-Nchumez is inhabited by adventurers and villains trying to uncover its secrets. Inside the ruins is a small group who's been working at crafting and making new types of Dwemer armors and

nodes.name: Mudcrabmancer
nodes.summary: Pelagiad may not be what is seems on the surface. Work with new companions and discover the true crime lords running the town and steal their powers for your own use. This mod includes new mudcrab themed light armor and a robe enchanted

nodes.name: The Curse of The Silent Siren
nodes.summary: Visit the Land's End Tavern, a new location in the Bitter Coast Region south of Hla Oad. Listen to the bard's tale at night to discover a new quest about a cursed ship, The Silent Siren. This mod adds two new locations to the Bitter Coast

nodes.name: The Buulorian
nodes.summary: Discover an ancient prophecy surrounding a child in need of rescue. Choose to sell him off or help him find the exalted order that seeks his powers for their ancient prophecy. Choose from two completely different mods but very similar

nodes.name: Redochan
nodes.summary: Brings new culture and life to Redoran architecture uwu! Think Redoran had no culture before? Look no further!

nodes.name: Starwind Dark Mouse Station
nodes.summary: Looming above the outer rim is a space station full of greed and evil, plotting to erase the galaxy from existence.

nodes.name: Aether Pirate's Discovery
nodes.summary: Find an Aethership over in the far north west of Vvardenfell, at the Arkngthunch-Sturdumz ruins and meet a pirate who has a mysterious trinket and new adventure to discover. This mod was built for OpenMW, an optional vanilla version is

nodes.name: Starwind Champion of Taris
nodes.summary: Fight your way through Taris remnants and undercity destroying Rakghoul nests and fighting hoards of Rakghouls. Join the Sith squad in Republic commando inspired combat and witness airstrikes and never before seen Rakghoul evolutions.

nodes.name: Investigations at Tel Eurus
nodes.summary: Investigate a series of attacks on Tel Eurus, follow the clues to uncover the mastermind behind it. Level 10 or higher recommended.

nodes.name: Starwind Pazaak Champion
nodes.summary: Join the Pazaak League and play pazaak against eight champions across the galaxy to join them at the top.

nodes.name: Smuggler's Market
nodes.summary: Pirates upon the shore of Azura's Coast, along with a market, tavern, and small cavern. Includes one short quest.

nodes.name: Neon Vivec
nodes.summary: Overhauls Vivec city into Neon Vivec style by Youngscrolls.

nodes.name: Astrology Shrines
nodes.summary: Adds three animated floating Astrology shrines across Vvardenfell which give temporary boosts to the player. Speed, attack and magicka.

nodes.name: Astrologian's Guild
nodes.summary: Join a fully playable guild and gain ranks to the top. The Astrologians are a small scale guild, with just a handful of guild members started by an Altmer named Nelangoth, who was previously part of the Mages Guild and still holds ties to

nodes.name: Caldera Mages Guild Basement
nodes.summary: Adds a basement to the Caldera Mages Guild decorated with OAAB and some custom assets. Two new mages have goods to sell, new Colovian hats as well as hoods from the OAAB data set. Another mage has new alteration scrolls and spells to buy

nodes.name: Duskmoth Ruins
nodes.summary: An Imperial style set of ruins south and east of Suran. Included is a minor quest involving the Knights of Stendarr and the evil within the ruins.

nodes.name: Starwind Endor
nodes.summary: A large add-on to the Starwind project. This will include the planet of Endor, a new planet to explore, with new factions and dilemmas to experience. This mod also includes three new playable races, an Ewok variant, protocol droid and

nodes.name: Silent Island
nodes.summary: This is a horror themed mod, with pirates, Sixth House, and romance. Though this mod plays fairly different, where many tough enemies can be killed by the environment. You can play the mod running and avoiding enemies the entire way, or

nodes.name: Frozen in Time
nodes.summary: This quest will bring you back in time, to solve a mystery untouched for hundreds of years. You'll also face off against Sheogorath's powerful minions for his amusement. Level 15-20 is recommended. Vampire characters can also do this quest.

nodes.name: Stronghold Fast Travel
nodes.summary: This mod will add fast travel NPCs to the game world upon reaching stage 3 on your great house stronghold. Also, after becoming the Nerevarine and defeating Dagoth Ur you'll receive a band to teleport you to the stronghold as well as other

nodes.name: Sea Dog Tavern
nodes.summary: This mod adds a new pirate themed tavern in the Grazelands, bringing many of Korana's better body pirate themed clothing and a few weapons to purchase or discover. With the tavern comes a quest into the dungeons below. Tested for vanilla

nodes.name: War Leader Nerevar
nodes.summary: Throughout the main quest, Nerevar claims the titles of Nerevarine and Hortator. This mod will give him an army to use at the battle of Red Mountain. As you progress throughout the main quest, Ashlanders and great house members will appear

nodes.name: Lost Redoran Relics
nodes.summary: This is a quest mod for House Redoran members. It adds a new cave north-northwest of Skar, unlocked only to those ranked Oathman and above. Upon exploring the underground ecosystem and lost Redoran settlements buried by lava you'll find a

nodes.name: Mudcrab Imports
nodes.summary: This mod adds new pirate themed quests, items and locations to Morrowind. Including an Imperial style tradehouse and a shady smugglers' den where you can embark on several quests and explore new underwater dungeons throughout the seas.
